channel.title: Format an external HD
channel.description:
I want to save some files on a maxtor external HD but the HD is currently set up for a mac and can't work with osx and windows at the same time so I need to format it. I can't access a mac right now so I have to format it from my pc. Does anybody know how I might do that?
Also, I've already tried maxtor's customer support and got no help.
Help appreciated.
EDIT: I was able to suffer through customer support and get my problem resolved.

item.title: Format an external HD
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
I already googled and didn’t get anything that would help. The eventual solution I got from tech support was completely different from anything I found on google.

Read full topic

item.title: Format an external HD
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
garthbartin, please use Google next time instead of making unnecessary threads, thanks.

Read full topic
